Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Wakeforest Drive and Lelion Way.
Room.LongDescription: Lelion Way runs east and west out of the intersection with Wakeforest Drive, which continues to the north and south. On both sides to the south of the intersection, there is some thick brush that prevents you from seeing into what appears to be a small park. There appear to be a couple of shops and facilities to the north along Wakeforest Drive.
